full_summary:
# Janitorial Services for Last Mountain Lake National Wildlife Area

## Solicitation Details
We are seeking proposals for Janitorial Services at the Last Mountain Lake (LML) National Wildlife Area, managed by the Canadian Wildlife Service (CWS) of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC). This tender involves providing janitorial services to the designated area.

### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000076681
* **Solicitation Title**: Janitorial Services at Last Mountain Lake National Wildlife Area
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 8, 2024, 3:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Publication Date**: April 17, 2024

### Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027
* **Location**: Last Mountain Lake National Wildlife Area, PO Box 280, Simpson, Saskatchewan S0G 4M0

### Selection Criteria
Submissions will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The bidder with the highest combined rating will be awarded the contract.

### Interested Parties
The ECCC's Purchasing Agent may be contacted for further information.

* **Mr. James Molinski**
* **Email**: james.molinski@ec.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (819) 975-1856
* **Address**: 351 St-Joseph Street, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H3, Canada

### Download Solicitation Document
The solicitation document can be downloaded from the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36270/5000076681_solicitation_en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36270/5000076681_solicitation_fr.pdf (French)
